name: Grink & Shrow
description:
Gameplay:

Work your way through puzzles using your dart gun to shrink and grow cubes.  The catch is that you can only grow a cube if you shrink another one.  Good luck!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

Q - Fire shrink dart

E - Fire grow dart

Credits:

Angel Bowers - Developer

Taylor Smith - Game Designer

All assets made by Kenney https://kenney.nl/

This game was made in about 42 hours for the Kenney Game Jam.  Unfortunately, the clock ran down as we were updating the submission and it was rejected mid-upload, so we were unable to actually submit to the jam.  However, it was a really rewarding experience.  I made this game with my little brother, Taylor, and it was his first time wearing the Game Designer hat.  We had a great time working on this together and we both look forward to making more contributions to the game dev community.

Source Code:

https://github.com/ANGELB3AR/KenneyJam_2022
